table_description: DigitalOcean Cloud Firewalls are a network-based, stateful firewall service for Droplets provided at no additional cost. Cloud firewalls block all traffic that isnâ€™t expressly permitted by a rule.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique universal identifier of this firewall.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: A time value given in ISO8601 combined date and time format that represents when the Firewall was created.

columns.name: status
columns.description: A status string indicating the current state of the Firewall.

columns.name: urn
columns.description: The uniform resource name (URN) for the Firewall.

columns.name: droplet_ids
columns.description: The list of the IDs of the Droplets assigned to the Firewall.

columns.name: inbound_rules
columns.description: The inbound access rule block for the Firewall.

columns.name: outbound_rules
columns.description: The outbound access rule block for the Firewall.

columns.name: pending_changes
columns.description: An list of object containing the fields, `droplet_id`, `removing`, and `status`. It is provided to detail exactly which Droplets are having their security policies updated. When empty, all changes have been successfully applied.
